name: Catbot Helper
description: Node API to assist catbot diagnostics.

BANDWIDTH_USER_ID.description: UserId for authentication.  Found on the account tab of the Bandwidth developer console.

BANDWIDTH_API_TOKEN.description: Token for authentication.  Found on the account tab of the Bandwidth developer console.

BANDWIDTH_API_SECRET.description: Secret for authentication.  Found on the account tab of the Bandwidth developer console.

PHONE_NUMBER_ONE.description: Bandwidth phone number that will send messages and transfer incoming messages.  Bandwidth number associated with your app on the my apps tab.

PHONE_NUMBER_TWO.description: Bandwidth phone number that will send messages and transfer incoming messages.  Bandwidth number associated with your app on the my apps tab.
